nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:enchanted_book","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Enchanted Book\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"Sharpness VII\",\"color\":\"blue\"}","{\"text\":\"Increases melee damage dealt by\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"65%\",\"color\":\"green\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Use this on an item in an Anvil\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"to apply it!\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Source:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"VII: \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"Scorpius,\",\"color\":\"gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"Experiments\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Applied To:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Sword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Fishing Weapon\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Longsword\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Gauntlet\",\"color\":\"white\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"Conflicts:\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Smite\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"- \",\"color\":\"gray\"},{\"text\":\"Bane of Arthropods\",\"color\":\"red\"}]}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"EPIC\",\"color\":\"dark_purple\",\"bold\":true}"]}}
